requirements.question: Watch an anime with the format “TV” that started airing in any Winter season
Wear Two Layers: Watch an anime that started airing in the same year and season as any other anime you used for this challenge
Watch an anime with any of the tags “Outdoor”, “Rural”, “Environmental” or “Survival”
Winter Frolicking: Watch an anime from either the Winter Sports or Penguins community lists
Frozen: Watch an anime that another participant has paused or dropped
Build a Snowman: Watch an anime that shares a tag, a genre and a staff member with three different anime you’re using for this challenge
Home Alone: Watch an anime with only one character in the cover art
Snow Day: Watch an anime with the same number of genres as days without an activity in the last full column (right side) of your Activity History on your profile
Ice Cold: Watch an anime with any of the tags “Tsundere”, “Kuudere” or “Yandere”
